Digital_Output.label: Digital Output
Digital_Output.description: Generic digital output for non-specific actuators

Digital_Output_State.label: Digital Output State
Digital_Output_State.description: The current state of a digital output.

Digital_Output_Polarity.label: Digital Output Polarity
Digital_Output_Polarity.description: The polarity of the digital output as a Boolean (False = Normal, True = Reversed).

Application_Type.label: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
